venue.address_1: will be emailed to yes and maybe responses
venue.name: Alisa's House

item.description:
Happy Thanksgiving!

 

We know that there are folks out there who might be on their own for the holiday and need a place to go, so……welcome to the first ever annual orphan Thanksgiving!

 

Alisa is opening her home for all to come and enjoy. We are asking that everyone either bring their favorite thanksgiving dish or (for those who are somewhat challenged in the kitchen) donate $15 and we will use that to buy the missing dishes. Bob M will be preparing the Turkey (thanks Bob) so that part is covered.

In your RSVP please indicate what you will be bringing so that we can plan accordingly. We’d hate to have all the same thing!

 

The itinerary for the day is as follows:

 

10am for those brave souls who would like to help set up (early morning mimosas and Macy’s parade will accompany the set up!)

 

12pm the games will start. (haven’t really figured out what they will be, so bring your favorites and we’ll work it out!)

 

3pm (roughly – don’t hold us to it) we will have a delicious banquet.

 

Anyone is welcome to come enjoy. For those who have family around you too are welcome to stop by and say hello at any time during the day, we’d love to see you.

 

This is a happy day for celebrating so come prepared to laugh and enjoy!

 

PS….bring your favorite beverage to add to the holiday spirit.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: HAPPY THANKSGIVING!!
